short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How long would it take me to earn the amount of money I am spending right now?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your spending habits by taking into account the time it will take you to earn the amount you are spending currently.

Affordable updates the prices on e-commerce websites to include how long it will take you to earn back the amount.

All major e-commerce websites (Amazon, Flipkart, etc) are supported. 
A full list of supported websites can be found on the github repository page: https://github.com/me-heer/affordable#supported-websites

Features:
ğŸ’¯ Reduce Price Charming: Prices are shown as close to the full number as possible. (e.g.: 69,990 -> 70,000)

% Percentage mode: Show price conversion as percentage of your income

âœ‹ Set a budget: Out of budget product prices are hidden to prevent impulsive purchases.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Hover Mode: Too intrusive? only show the price conversion when you hover the product price with the cursor

ğŸŒˆ Colour Code Prices: Affordable items are greener. Expensive items are redder.
